Html: getNumberFormat() returns General even though the cell I performed it on contains a date. getValue() returns the value perfectly but in number format. May I know what is wrong?

Here is what you use setReadDataOnly(true)? In this case, you lose the notion of format.
Whatever the case, getValue() returns the raw value, if you want to have the value formatted, subject to have something with getFormatCode, used getFormattedValue.
If you know that the value is a date, and that you have loaded the file without formats, uses PHPExcel_Style_NumberFormat::toFormattedString
